definition: see 博鰲鎮|博鳌镇[Bo2 ao2 zhen4]

pinyin: Bo2 ao2 Ya4 zhou1 Lun4 tan2

sentences.english: Jia welcomed King Gyanendra to the annual conference of the forum.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林欢迎贾南德拉国王来华出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会。

sentences.english: I am delighted to be here at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference2009.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴参加博鳌亚洲论坛2009年年会。

sentences.english: We've been to Yalong Bay, Boao, size Cave, Big East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们去过亚龙湾，博鳌，大小洞天，大东海。

sentences.english: Discussions related to the real estate industry are very popular at this year's Boao Forum for Asia for a good reason.
sentences.chinese: 今年的博鳌论坛上，关于房地产的讨论很热烈。

sentences.english: Boao today greets us with vast ocean, high sky and warm breeze.
sentences.chinese: 今天的博鳌，海阔帆舞，天高风暖。

sentences.english: Boao is a town in Qionghai. It is the seat of the Boao Asia Forum.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌是琼海的一个镇，也是博鳌亚洲论坛的永久会址。

sentences.english: Boao is a town in Qionghai. It is the seat of the Boao Asia Forum.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌是琼海的一个镇，也是博鳌亚洲论坛的永久会址。

sentences.english: Boao Forum for Asia (BFA) is a non-government and non-profit international organization.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌亚洲论坛是一个非政府的，非营利的国际组织。

sentences.english: Boao is the seat of the Boao Aisa Forum, which is situated in Qionghai City.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌位于琼海，博鳌亚洲论坛设立在此。

sentences.english: Boao is the seat of the Boao Aisa Forum, which is situated in Qionghai City.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌位于琼海，博鳌亚洲论坛设立在此。

sentences.english: I am a BFA member who enjoys special discount on registration fee.
sentences.chinese: 我是博鳌亚洲论坛会员，享受优惠价格参会。

sentences.english: Eric received a BFA in painting in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克获得了博鳌亚洲论坛于1992年在绘画。

pinyin: Bo2 ao2 Ya4 zhou1 Lun4 tan2

definition: Baoting Li and Miao autonomous county, Hainan

estuary/coastal inlet/river mouth/seaport/see also 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]
